title: Free Syrian Army
summary: The Free Syrian Army (FSA) (Arabic: الْجَيْش السُّوْرِي الْحُرّ‎, romanized: al-Jayš as-Sūrī al-Ḥurr) is a loose faction in the Syrian Civil War[16][17] founded on 29 July 2011[18] by officers of the Syrian Armed Forces whose goal is to bring down the government of Bashar al-Assad.[17][18][19] A formal organization at its founding, its structure gradually dissipated by late 2012, and the FSA identity has since been used by various opposition groups.[20][21][22][23]
